name: Duck Creek
title: duckcreek.com
shortDescription: Duck Creek provides low-code SaaS core systems designed specifically for P&C/general insurance companies. It enables insurers to deliver protection faster and smarter, enhancing customer experiences through personalized services. Insurers can quickly adapt to market changes with reusable product modules and increase sales through improved distribution channels. An example use case is a P&C insurer using Duck Creek to streamline claims processing and policy management.
cons: Primarily focused on P&C insurance, not versatile
Potential complexity in initial setup and integration
May require training for optimal use
